heroes.name: ANA
heroes.description: One of the founding members of Overwatch, Ana uses her skills and expertise to defend her home and the people she cares for.

heroes.name: ASHE
heroes.description: Ashe is the ambitious and calculating leader of the Deadlock Rebels Gang and a respected figure in the criminal underworld.

heroes.name: BAPTISTE
heroes.description: An elite combat medic and ex-Talon operative, Baptiste now uses his skills to help those whose lives have been impacted by war.

heroes.name: BASTION
heroes.description: Once a frontline combatant in the devastating Omnic Crisis, this curious Bastion unit now explores the world, fascinated by nature but wary of a fearful humanity.

heroes.name: BRIGITTE
heroes.description: No longer sitting on the sidelines, Brigitte Lindholm has taken up arms to defend those in need of protection.

heroes.name: CASSIDY
heroes.description: Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, the outlaw Cole Cassidy doles out justice on his own terms.
heroes.origin: Santa Fe, New Mexico, USA (formerly), Watchpoint: Gibraltar

heroes.name: D.VA
heroes.description: D.Va is a former professional gamer who now uses her skills to pilot a state-of-the-art mech in defense of her homeland.
heroes.origin: MEKA Base, Busan, South Korea (formerly), Watchpoint: Gibraltar

heroes.name: DOOMFIST
heroes.description: Doomfist is the calculating leader of Talon, a terrorist organization and paramilitary force that works in direct opposition to Overwatch.

heroes.name: ECHO
heroes.description: Echo is a multirole, adaptive robot with the most sophisticated artificial intelligence in the world, originally designed by Dr. Mina Liao for use during combat missions with Overwatch.

heroes.name: GENJI
heroes.description: The cyborg ninja Genji Shimada has made peace with the augmented body he once rejected, and in doing so, he has discovered a higher humanity.
heroes.origin: Hanamura, Japan (formerly), Shambali Monastery, Nepal (formerly), Watchpoint: Gibraltar

heroes.name: HANZO
heroes.description: Mastering his skills as a bowman and an assassin, Hanzo Shimada strives to prove himself as a warrior without peer.

heroes.name: JUNKER QUEEN
heroes.description: Armed with her axe, Carnage, and her electromagnetic gauntlet, the cutthroat leader of the Junkers is on a mission to rule the world.

heroes.name: JUNKRAT
heroes.description: Junkrat is an explosives-obsessed demolitionist who lives to cause chaos and destruction.

heroes.name: KIRIKO
heroes.description: As Miko of the Kanezaka shrine and daughter of the Shimada's former swordmaster, Kiriko Kamori channels both her spiritual and ninja skills to heal her fractured city.

heroes.name: LÚCIO
heroes.description: Lúcio is an international celebrity who inspires social change through his music and activism.

heroes.name: MEI
heroes.description: Mei is a scientist who has taken the fight to preserve the environment into her own hands.

heroes.name: MERCY
heroes.description: A guardian angel to those who come under her care, Dr. Angela Ziegler is a peerless healer, a brilliant scientist, and a staunch advocate for peace.

heroes.name: MOIRA
heroes.description: Equal parts brilliant and controversial, scientist Moira O'Deorain is on the cutting edge of genetic engineering, searching for a way to rewrite the fundamental building blocks of life.

heroes.name: ORISA
heroes.description: Built from parts of one of Numbani's short-lived OR15 defense robots, Orisa is the city's newest protector, though she still has much to learn.

heroes.name: PHARAH
heroes.description: Fareeha Amari's commitment to duty runs in her blood. She comes from a long line of highly decorated soldiers and burns with the desire to serve with honor.

heroes.name: RAMATTRA
heroes.description: The brutal leader of Null Sector will stop at nothing to see his vision for the world realized.

heroes.name: REAPER
heroes.description: Some speak of a black-robed terrorist known only as the Reaper. His identity and motives are a mystery. What is known is that where he appears, death follows.

heroes.name: REINHARDT
heroes.description: Reinhardt Wilhelm styles himself as a champion of a bygone age, who lives by the knightly codes of valor, justice, and courage.

heroes.name: ROADHOG
heroes.description: Roadhog is a powerful enforcer with a well-earned reputation for random and wanton destruction.

heroes.name: SIGMA
heroes.description: Brilliant astrophysicist Dr. Siebren de Kuiper's life changed forever when an experiment gone wrong gave him the ability to control gravity; now, Talon manipulates him to their own ends.
heroes.origin: The Hague, Netherlands (formerly), International Space Station (formerly)

heroes.name: SOJOURN
heroes.description: As a leader in the bygone days of Overwatch, Vivian Chase, callsign Sojourn, is determined to ensure its new heroes don’t repeat the mistakes of the past.

heroes.name: SOLDIER: 76
heroes.description: The target of an international manhunt, the vigilante known as Soldier: 76 wages a personal war to expose the truth behind Overwatch's collapse.

heroes.name: SOMBRA
heroes.description: One of the world's most notorious hackers, Sombra uses information to manipulate those in power.

heroes.name: SYMMETRA
heroes.description: Symmetra literally bends reality. By manipulating hard-light constructs, she crafts the world as she wishes it to be, in hopes of engineering a perfect society.

heroes.name: TORBJÖRN
heroes.description: At its height, Overwatch possessed one of the most advanced armaments on the planet, which could be traced to the workshop of an ingenious engineer named Torbjörn Lindholm.

heroes.name: TRACER
heroes.description: The former Overwatch agent known as Tracer is a time-jumping adventurer and an irrepressible force for good.

heroes.name: WIDOWMAKER
heroes.description: Widowmaker is the perfect assassin: a patient, ruthlessly efficient killer who shows neither emotion nor remorse.

heroes.name: WINSTON
heroes.description: A super-intelligent, genetically engineered gorilla, Winston is a brilliant scientist and a champion for humanity’s potential.

heroes.name: WRECKING BALL
heroes.description: A resourceful and highly intelligent mechanic and fighter, Wrecking Ball rose from the laboratories of Horizon Lunar Colony to become the Junker Queen’s champion.

heroes.name: ZARYA
heroes.description: Aleksandra Zaryanova is one of the world's strongest women, a celebrated athlete who sacrificed personal glory to protect her family, friends, and country in a time of war.
heroes.origin: Krasnoyarsk Front (formerly), Novoanskoye Forward Base, Siberia, Russia (formerly), Watchpoint: Gibraltar

heroes.name: ZENYATTA
heroes.description: Zenyatta is an omnic monk who wanders the world in search of spiritual enlightenment. It is said that those who cross his path are never the same again.
